/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. A gas station is visible on the left side of the image, indicating the presence of modern infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the background. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
